item.description:
HAPPY VALENTINE'S DAY !!!

We're celebrating a very special night with dining and dancing for all the lovers out there... and those looking for love ... at il Monticello ! Come join us for a terrific night...great music...sumptuous dining... fabulous company!

Here's what it's all about...

Dancing to DJ’s Top 40/Soft Rock


Singles Celebrate Valentine’s Day!


Dinner Buffet 8-9:30 • Coffee/Dessert at 11:30
Special Valentine Buffet of Chef-Carved Top
Round of Beef, Chicken Francese, Cavatelli
and Broccoli Alfredo, Vegetable du Jour,
Tossed Salad, Rolls and butter

Plus a Fabulous Valentine Dessert Buffet!


Dress to Impress/No Jeans
Jackets Requested/Dressy • $20...Pay at the door


BTW...Anyone celebrating a Feb. birthday gets in for free. We will have a champagne toast and a birthday cake for the birthday boys and girls!!! Just please let me know so i can arrange it.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: il Monticello...Valentine Ball !!!
